title: Installation issue: julia (missing LLVM cpu mapping for 'zen')
body:
Julia package uses LLVM-style CPU names.  PR #19549 added mapping for 'zen2' architecture, but omitted 'zen'.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install julia@1.5.4%gcc@8.4.0 +cxx ~mkl arch=linux-rhel8-zen
...    
    CC ui/repl.o
    LINK usr/bin/julia
Warning: git information unavailable; versioning information limited
    JULIA usr/lib/julia/corecompiler.ji
ERROR: Invalid CPU name zen.
make[1]: *** [sysimage.mk:61: /tmp/devspackswinst/spack-stage/spack-stage-julia-1.5.4-uxsnud6t4mvcfprlrvd7ecmlf3hh6vs4/spack-src/usr/lib/julia/corecompiler.ji] Error 1
make: *** [Makefile:81: julia-sysimg-ji] Error 2
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
```console
spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2429-f5e6c32495
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-rhel8-zen2
* **Concretizer:** original
```
(Although on a zen2 system, was using an older gcc which only supports zen, not zen2, hence the issue)

### Additional information

* [spack-build-01-install-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6593992/spack-build-01-install-out.txt)
* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6593993/spack-build-env.txt)
* [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6593994/spack-build-out.txt)

Maintainers of julia: @glennpj 

### General information

- [x ] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x ] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x ] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
